conspiracies:
• The Great Reset: A theory alleging that a group of global elites is using the pandemic to impose a new world order, dismantle capitalism, and strip citizens of their rights.
  • QAnon: A wide-ranging conspiracy theory that claims a cabal of Satan-worshiping pedophiles is running a global child sex-trafficking ring and that former President Donald Trump is secretly fighting against them.
  • COVID-19 Lab Leak Theory: The theory that the COVID-19 virus was not a natural occurrence but was instead created in and escaped from a laboratory in Wuhan, China.
  • 5G and COVID-19 Connection: A debunked theory that the rollout of 5G cellular networks is either causing or exacerbating the symptoms of COVID-19.
  • Birds Aren't Real: A satirical conspiracy theory that claims all birds in the United States were replaced with government surveillance drones between 1959 and 1971.
  • Flat Earth Theory: The belief that the Earth is a flat disc, rather than a sphere, and that evidence to the contrary is a fabrication by NASA and other government agencies.
  • Chemtrails: The theory that the long-lasting condensation trails left by airplanes are actually chemical or biological agents being deliberately sprayed for undisclosed purposes.
  • The Mandela Effect: A phenomenon where a large group of people remembers something differently than how it is in reality, leading to theories about alternate universes or timelines.
  • Project Blue Beam: A theory that NASA, in cooperation with the United Nations, is attempting to implement a New Age religion with the Antichrist at its head and start a New World Order, via a technologically simulated Second Coming.
  • The Denver Airport Conspiracy: A collection of theories about the Denver International Airport, suggesting it is a headquarters for the Illuminati or a New World Order, citing its strange art, underground bunkers, and supposed Masonic symbols.
